name: JaguarsFan
0:
”Alexa, open Jaguars fan.”
”Alexa, ask Jaguars fan for a flash briefing on the Jaguars.”
”Alexa, ask Jaguars fan about the previous game score.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jaguars fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Jaguars by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Jaguars.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Jaguars Fan how are the Jaguars doing? 

Alexa, ask Jaguars Fan who do the Jaguars play next?

Alexa, ask Jaguars Fan Allen Robinson (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Jaguars:


Alexa, ask Jaguars Fan to tell me some trivia about the Jaguars. 

Alexa, ask Jaguars Fan how many Super Bowls have the Jaguars won?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
